mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CONNECTION, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.PREVPROCESS, t1.PREVWFSTEPID, t1.PREVWFSTEPNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORID, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME FROM T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR t1

SELECT t1.`CONNECTION`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PREVPROCESS`, t1.`PREVWFSTEPID`, t1.`PREVWFSTEPNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFACTORID`, t1.`WFACTORNAME`, t1.`WFTMPSTEPACTORID`, t1.`WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME` FROM `T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR` t1

SELECT t1.CONNECTION, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.PREVPROCESS, t1.PREVWFSTEPID, t1.PREVWFSTEPNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORID, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME FROM T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR t1

SELECT t1.CONNECTION AS CONNECTION, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PREVPROCESS AS PREVPROCESS, t1.PREVWFSTEPID AS PREVWFSTEPID, t1.PREVWFSTEPNAME AS PREVWFSTEPNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID AS WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME AS WFACTORNAME, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORID AS WFTMPSTEPACTORID, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME AS WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME FROM T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR t1

SELECT t1.CONNECTION AS CONNECTION, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PREVPROCESS AS PREVPROCESS, t1.PREVWFSTEPID AS PREVWFSTEPID, t1.PREVWFSTEPNAME AS PREVWFSTEPNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTORID AS WFACTORID, t1.WFACTORNAME AS WFACTORNAME, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORID AS WFTMPSTEPACTORID, t1.WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME AS WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME FROM T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR t1

SELECT t1.[CONNECTION], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PREVPROCESS], t1.[PREVWFSTEPID], t1.[PREVWFSTEPNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFACTORID], t1.[WFACTORNAME], t1.[WFTMPSTEPACTORID], t1.[WFTMPSTEPACTORNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFTMPSTEPACTOR] t1
